subject: F1 25 game support
description_text:
Hi Simsonn,

I recently purchased the F1 2025 game.
My pedals are not working with this game.
I am running the software Simsonn Manager 2.1.0.

Is there any option for this game?

conversations.body_text: Hi Bart Caethoven, In our test environment, F1 2025 runs without any issues. Because the RX axis on our previous handbrake was not disabled, it may cause F1 2025 to fail to bind correctly. You can try fixing this issue using SIMSONN Manager 2.1.1: Open the SIMSONN Manager 2.1.1 software. In the interface, click the “Restore” button. Then click the “Save” button. Reinsert the USB cable. Finally, test to confirm if the RX axis has been successfully disabled. https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mS9dS2GyzhRYo81BcmTIOXY1POa6RvST/view?usp=drive_link

Ok I will try later this day.

Also, what I see is the game doesn't show up in the list on the right.

Every version of the F1 game shows up, only 25 doesn't.

My Assetto Corsa Competizione has no problem, it shows up.
Hi Bart Caethoven, When testing, please take a screenshot of the F1 2025 settings screen so I can compare it and check for any differences from the settings on our computer.

Hi thanks!
It worked like this.

Thank you a lot for the help guys.
